1.text: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song. God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.

2.text: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.

3.text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

4.text: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.

5.text: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.

6.text: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.

7.text: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
